The image was shared on Facebook on Marc: 2021, claiming to show "Nigeria's Presidential Villa, Aso Rock On Fire" as breaking news. The post was shared more than 270 times.
The post claimed that the fire outbreak: Nigeria has come to an End now, since Aso Rock has been burn down totally."
Multiple reports and statements from off: including a tweet from the presidential spokesman, confirmed that the fire was a bushfire that occurred outside the perimeter walls of the Villa and was successfully contained without any damage to the villa itself.
